sqlQuery.name: bulkAnswerFilterCounts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH geneList -- list of (distinct) genes in the current ID query AS (SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS counter, gene_source_id AS source_id FROM ##WDK_ID_SQL##) SELECT filter_name, max(count) AS count FROM ( -- count genes in geneList by organism SELECT organism AS filter_name, sum(counter) AS count FROM webready.GeneAttributes ga, geneList WHERE ga.source_id = geneList.source_id GROUP BY organism UNION -- count genes in geneList by species SELECT species AS filter_name, sum(counter) AS count FROM webready.GeneAttributes ga, geneList WHERE ga.source_id = geneList.source_id GROUP BY species UNION -- zero-count rows for above filters SELECT filter_name, 0 as count FROM webready.GeneSummaryFilter UNION -- overall gene count (simply the cardinality of geneList) SELECT 'all_results' AS filter_name, count(*) AS count FROM geneList ) t GROUP BY filter_name

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count (distinct gene_source_id) as count FROM ($$WDK_ID_SQL$$) t

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenesWithMissingTranscripts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH WDK_ID_SQL as $$WDK_ID_SQL$$ -- wonder if we dont want to use the prefiltered result SELECT count (distinct m.gene_source_id) as propertyValue FROM ( SELECT ta.gene_source_id, ta.source_id FROM webready.TranscriptAttributes ta , (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_1 WHERE idsql_1.gene_source_id = ta.gene_source_id EXCEPT SELECT gene_source_id, source_id FROM (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_2 --where idsql_2.matched_result = 'Y' --cannot be used in boolean steps, plus might not be needed ) m

sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, gene_source_id, project_id, wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$

sqlQuery.name: AllOrthologGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS source_id, MAX(ta.gene_source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS gene_source_id, MAX(ta.project_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS project_id, MAX(ca.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, webready.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id GROUP BY ta.orthomcl_name

sqlQuery.name: OrganismGeneInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ta.source_id, ta.gene_source_id, ta.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, webready.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.organism like $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: DistinctGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ t.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) AS source_id, ta.project_id, ta.gene_source_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, webready.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.species = $$species$$ GROUP BY ta.gene_source_id,ta.project_id ) t

sqlQuery.name: DeprecatedGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c, webready.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = c.source_id AND ta.organism = 'Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB' AND ta.is_deprecated = $$deprecated_genes$$

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c WHERE c.project_id = $$Project$$

sqlQuery.name: PortalDistinctGenes
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT orthoreps.source_id, ta2.project_id, ta2.gene_source_id, , orthoreps.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY CASE ta.organism WHEN 'Plasmodium falciparum 3D7' THEN 1 WHEN 'Plasmodium berghei strain ANKA' THEN 2 WHEN 'Plasmodium chabaudi chabaudi' THEN 3 WHEN 'Plasmodium knowlesi strain H' THEN 4 WHEN 'Plasmodium vivax Sal-1' THEN 5 WHEN 'Plasmodium yoelii yoelii str. 17X' THEN 6
WHEN 'Trypanosoma brucei TREU927' THEN 11 WHEN 'Leishmania braziliensis' THEN 12 WHEN 'Leishmania infantum' THEN 13 WHEN 'Leishmania major strain Friedlin' THEN 14 WHEN 'Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener' THEN 15
WHEN 'Cryptosporidium parvum Iowa II' THEN 21 WHEN 'Cryptosporidium hominis' THEN 22 WHEN 'Cryptosporidium muris' THEN 23 WHEN 'Cryptosporidium parvum' THEN 24
WHEN 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1' THEN 31 WHEN 'Toxoplasma gondii RH' THEN 32 WHEN 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49' THEN 33 WHEN 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG' THEN 34 WHEN 'Neospora caninum' THEN 35
WHEN 'Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803' THEN 41
WHEN 'Trichomonas vaginalis G3' THEN 5 END ) AS source_id , max(ca.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, webready.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id GROUP BY ta.orthomcl_name ) orthoreps , webready.TranscriptAttributes ta2 WHERE orthoreps.source_id = ta2.source_id ) t
